content: संनिपत् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To alight, descend. {@--2@} To come together, assemble, meet together. {@--3@} To fall upon, attack; <ls>U. 3. 6.</ls> {@--4@} To arrive, appear. {@--5@} To perish, be destroyed. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To throw or shoot down, discharge. {@--2@} To convoke, convene, assemble, collect together.
